segments.text: Hello ! We ’ Ve been waiting for our lunch order for over an hour . Did you forget our order ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m sorry , sir . Could you tell me your name and order again , please ? I ’ ll check on the delay .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The name ’ s Stanley Morris and the order was for two chef ’ s salads .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you , Mr . Morris . Please wait one moment and let me check on the order . Would you like anything to drink , sir ? On the house .
segments.speaker: S2
